episodes.title: The Winter of Our Monetized Content
episodes.plot: Bart and Homer become social media celebrities when a video of them fighting goes viral; Lisa fights the school's new industrialized detention system.

episodes.title: Go Big or Go Homer
episodes.plot: Homer inspires a 35-year-old millennial who idolizes him to start his own business, which leads the mob to chase both of them.

episodes.title: The Fat Blue Line
episodes.plot: When the wrong man is arrested for pickpocketing Springfield during the San Castellaneta street festival, Chief Wiggum sets out to catch the real criminal.

episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XXX
episodes.plot: The 30th Treehouse of Horror features a demon Maggie, a mission to rescue Milhouse from another dimension, dead-Homer's spirit trying on some new bodies for size and Selma finally finding love in an unlikely place - the alien in the basement.

episodes.title: Gorillas on the Mast
episodes.plot: After visiting Aquatraz Water Park, Lisa and Bart set out to free from captivity the most vicious animals in Springfield. Homer fulfills a lifelong dream and buys a boat, only to realize how much boat ownership sucks.

episodes.title: Marge the Lumberjill
episodes.plot: Marge becomes a competitive lumberjack and goes on a month-long retreat to Portland with her trainer, whom Homer fears will take his wife away from him.

episodes.title: Livin la Pura Vida
episodes.plot: The Simpsons join other Springfield families on the Van Houtens' annual trip to Costa Rica, where Homer befriends Patty's new girlfriend and Lisa discovers how the Van Houtens are able to afford this trip every year.

episodes.title: Thanksgiving of Horror
episodes.plot: The Simpsons face various Thanksgiving nightmares, including the first Thanksgiving, an A.I. mishap and a dangerous space mission complicated by a sentient cranberry sauce.

episodes.title: Todd, Todd, Why Hast Thou Forsaken Me?
episodes.plot: Todd blames God for his mother's death and rejects his faith, so Ned sends him to live with the Simpsons, hoping they can scare him into believing in God again.

episodes.title: Bobby, It's Cold Outside
episodes.plot: Sideshow Bob gets the role of Santa Claus at Santa's Village amusement park. Meanwhile, someone is stealing all the Christmas packages off people's front porches.

episodes.title: Hail to the Teeth
episodes.plot: Homer and Marge attend Artie Ziff's wedding and become quite uncomfortable when they realize that his bride-to-be is a clone of Marge.

episodes.title: The Miseducation of Lisa Simpson
episodes.plot: The sea captain finds treasure for which he's been searching for 40 years, but City Hall claims it since it was in city limits. Marge convinces the townspeople to use the windfall to build a STEM school. Homer crusades against automation.

episodes.title: Frinkcoin
episodes.plot: Professor Frink invents a cryptocurrency that makes him the richest man in Springfield, a title Mr. Burns has no intention of giving up.

episodes.title: Bart the Bad Guy
episodes.plot: Bart uses spoilers for a superhero movie he saw to get what he wants, but two movie executives will stop at nothing to keep his knowledge secret.

episodes.title: Screenless
episodes.plot: Marge implements a limit on screen time for the whole family, only to realize she's the one addicted to screens.

episodes.title: Better Off Ned
episodes.plot: Jealous of Bart's bond with Ned, Homer mentors Nelson in retaliation, but an act of heroism helps Homer to regain Bart's respect.

episodes.title: Highway to Well
episodes.plot: Marge gets a job at an upscale cannabis dispensary leading Homer to open a competing business that replicates the scuzzy days of scoring weed from and old-school pot connection.

episodes.title: The Incredible Lightness of Being a Baby
episodes.plot: Maggie reunites with baby Hudson, but Marge isn't too crazy about his mom. Homer befriends Cletus Spuckler who recently discovered a vast underground reserve of helium gas on his property, attracting unwanted attention from Mr. Burns.

episodes.title: Warrin' Priests
episodes.plot: Reverend Lovejoy investigates the mysterious past of a new priest who's come to town and shaken things up at church.

episodes.title: Warrin' Priests Part 2
episodes.plot: In Michigan, Reverend Lovejoy learns the true reason why Bode came to Springfield and the congregation must decide whether to banish their new priest.

episodes.title: The Hateful Eight-Year-Olds
episodes.plot: Lisa joins a group of rich girls when she makes a friend who loves horses; Homer takes Marge on a romantic cruise.

episodes.title: The Way of the Dog
episodes.plot: The Simpsons explore the tragic past of Santa's Little Helper when he bites Marge.
